title: RatingPriorityResolutionEnum
description:
Represents an enumeration list to identify which Collateral Criteria type should have priority over others. If set to 'Issuer', the rating in the 
  Issuer Criteria has priority or is used if there is no Asset criteria. If set to 'Asset', the rating in the Asset Criteria has priority or is used if there is no Issuer rating.

oneOf.title: Asset
oneOf.description: Denotes that the Asset Criteria has priority.

oneOf.title: Average
oneOf.description: Denotes that average rating should be used if several criteria apply.

oneOf.title: Highest
oneOf.description: Denotes that highest rating should be used if several criteria apply.

oneOf.title: Issuer
oneOf.description: Denotes that the Issuer Criteria has priority.

oneOf.title: Lowest
oneOf.description: Denotes that lowest rating should be used if several criteria apply.
